attributes.action: I would like to scrap all tuition fees for university students
attributes.additional_details: Because the fees stop many students from attending to university as they have not got the money for it and it stops them from being educated and getting their dream job in the future
attributes.background: I would like to remove all the fees for university students

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631025
